overview: Dressed in a bra and thong that highlight her seductive curves, Blake Eden admires herself in the mirror. • Kirra can't keep her hands off of her horny body that is covered by just a bra and underwear. • Luscious Carolina Sweets waits for Melody Wylde to join her in the kitchen while dreaming about what she's going to bake. • Alecia Fox and Chelsy Sun meet in the kitchen, and though their original plan was breakfast they find that their reality is very different but equally satisfying.
title: Glamour Girls
